aka: Digital Short Films by Three Filmmakers: Talk to Her

cast.name: 阿南达·爱华灵咸 Ananda Everingham

writer.name: 达赫让·奥米尔巴耶夫 Darezhan Omirbayev
Kim Hoh Wong Kim Hoh Wong

director.name: 彭力·云旦拿域安 Pen-Ek Ratanaruang
达赫让·奥米尔巴耶夫 Darezhan Omirbayev

trans_title: Digital Short Films by Three Filmmakers: Talk to Her
introduction: This program features three digital short films by Asian filmmakers. Singapore veteran filmmaker Eric Khoo's NO DAY OFF (39 min) records the life of a maid who leaves her husband and baby for Singapore. Darezhan Omirbayev's ABOUT LOVE (38 min) is a bitter love story based on Anton Chekhov's novel, in which a lonely math teacher falls in love with her married university classmate. Pen-ek Ratanaruang's TWELVE TWENTY (30 min) depicts the encounters of a man and a woman on a long haul flight, where they spend the next twelve hours and twenty minutes reading, drinking, eating and watching movies and sleeping by each other's side, as if they are a married couple.
